text: Parthiv Ajay Patel (born 9 March 1985) is an Indian cricketer who is known for his role as a wicket-keeper-batsman. He has represented the Indian national cricket team in various formats of the game, including Tests, One Day Internationals (ODIs), and Twenty20 Internationals (T20Is). == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers
title: Parthiv Patel
